attributes.action: Put more uniformed officers across all London Boroughs.
attributes.background:
Across London 65th murder in a 3 year period. This is rapidly rising. Youths are carrying weapons and attacking innocent people. 
We need more uniformed officers across all Boroughs, to tackle knife crime. No more people need to get injured or murdered. This needs to be sorted QUICK & FAST.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's about something the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for.

The Mayor of London is responsible for the Metropolitan Police.

You can find out how to petition the Greater London Assembly, which looks at the work of the Mayor, here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions

You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to provide more funding to the Metropolitan Police if that is something you would like to see happen.

You might also like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/228088
